analysis.statement: Build security considerations into the Software Development Lifecycle and align with CISA Secure By Design principles

checks.description: Manual validation required - No automation possible
checks.response: This KSI requires comprehensive manual review of Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) processes, secure coding practices, design review procedures, threat modeling processes, and alignment with CISA Secure by Design principles. No automated validation methods are available for assessing SDLC integration and design philosophy compliance.
